trans-unit.source: I use Mobile Services, how does App Service help?
trans-unit.target: I use Mobile Services, how does App Service help?

trans-unit.source: Learn what advantages does App Service bring to your existing Mobile Services projects.
trans-unit.target: Learn what advantages does App Service bring to your existing Mobile Services projects.

trans-unit.source: Your existing Mobile Service is safe and will remain supported.
trans-unit.target: Your existing Mobile Service is safe and will remain supported.

trans-unit.source: However there are number of advantages the Azure App Service platform provides for your mobile app that are not available today with Mobile Services:
trans-unit.target: However there are number of advantages the Azure App Service platform provides for your mobile app that are not available today with Mobile Services:

trans-unit.source: Simpler, easier and more cost effective offering for apps that include both web and mobile clients
trans-unit.target: Simpler, easier and more cost effective offering for apps that include both web and mobile clients

trans-unit.source: New host features including Web Jobs, custom CNames, better monitoring
trans-unit.target: New host features including Web Jobs, custom CNames, better monitoring

trans-unit.source: Turnkey integration with Office 365, Dynamics CRM, Salesforce, and other vital SaaS APIs.
trans-unit.target: Turnkey integration with Office 365, Dynamics CRM, Salesforce, and other vital SaaS APIs.

trans-unit.source: Support for Java and PHP backend code, in addition to Node.js and .NET
trans-unit.target: Support for Java and PHP backend code, in addition to Node.js and .NET

trans-unit.source: Turnkey integration with Traffic Manager
trans-unit.target: Turnkey integration with Traffic Manager

trans-unit.source: Connectivity to your on-premise resources and VPNs using VNet in addition to Hybrid Connections
trans-unit.target: Connectivity to your on-premise resources and VPNs using VNet in addition to Hybrid Connections

trans-unit.source: Monitoring and troubleshooting for your app using NewRelic or AppInsights, as well as alerts
trans-unit.target: Monitoring and troubleshooting for your app using NewRelic or AppInsights, as well as alerts

trans-unit.source: Richer spectrum of the underlying compute resources, e.g. VM sizes
trans-unit.target: Richer spectrum of the underlying compute resources, e.g. VM sizes

trans-unit.source: Built-in auto scale, load balancing, and performance monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Built-in auto scale, load balancing, and performance monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Built-in staging, backup, roll-back, and testing-in-production capabilities
trans-unit.target: Built-in staging, backup, roll-back, and testing-in-production capabilities

trans-unit.source: In Azure App Service the Mobile App backend code runs in the same container as Web App and API App.
trans-unit.target: In Azure App Service the Mobile App backend code runs in the same container as Web App and API App.

trans-unit.source: As such you can take advantage of all the features in this container, including some of those that are not currently present in Mobile Services:
trans-unit.target: As such you can take advantage of all the features in this container, including some of those that are not currently present in Mobile Services:

trans-unit.source: Add continuously running backend logic via Web Jobs
trans-unit.target: Add continuously running backend logic via Web Jobs

trans-unit.source: Ensure your backend code is always running
trans-unit.target: Ensure your backend code is always running

trans-unit.source: Use custom CNames to provide friendly and stable names to your mobile backend endpoints
trans-unit.target: Use custom CNames to provide friendly and stable names to your mobile backend endpoints

trans-unit.source: Geo-scale your app with Traffic Manager
trans-unit.target: Geo-scale your app with Traffic Manager

trans-unit.source: Include any libraries and packages you want.
trans-unit.target: Include any libraries and packages you want.

trans-unit.source: On .NET, the assemblies you deploy are the assemblies that are used at runtime; there is never a conflict with versions in the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: On .NET, the assemblies you deploy are the assemblies that are used at runtime; there is never a conflict with versions in the hosting environment.

trans-unit.source: (For .NET) Leverage any feature of ASP.NET, including MVC
trans-unit.target: (For .NET) Leverage any feature of ASP.NET, including MVC

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service makes it easy to connect your Mobile App to SaaS APIs including Office 365, Dynamics, Salesforce, SAP, and more.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service makes it easy to connect your Mobile App to SaaS APIs including Office 365, Dynamics, Salesforce, SAP, and more.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service offers turn-key authentication on-behalf of the user and allows you to perform true Single Sign On accross all SaaS APIs you use by associating tokens for individual SaaS APIs with your primary identity
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service offers turn-key authentication on-behalf of the user and allows you to perform true Single Sign On accross all SaaS APIs you use by associating tokens for individual SaaS APIs with your primary identity

trans-unit.source: With Mobile Services today you can already use Hybrid Connections to access on-premise resources.
trans-unit.target: With Mobile Services today you can already use Hybrid Connections to access on-premise resources.

trans-unit.source: However there are situations where a VPN solution is preferred.
trans-unit.target: However there are situations where a VPN solution is preferred.

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service you can use Azure VNet for your Mobile App backend code.
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service you can use Azure VNet for your Mobile App backend code.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service offers broader and richer support for developer platforms including Java, PHP, and Python in addition to .NET and Node.js supported in Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service offers broader and richer support for developer platforms including Java, PHP, and Python in addition to .NET and Node.js supported in Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: With Mobile Services, all instances of your backend code were running on Small VMs.
trans-unit.target: With Mobile Services, all instances of your backend code were running on Small VMs.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service enables you to select the size of the VMs from a much richer set of options.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service enables you to select the size of the VMs from a much richer set of options.

trans-unit.source: You cna also quickly scale up or out to handle any incoming customer load, based on various performance metrics.
trans-unit.target: You cna also quickly scale up or out to handle any incoming customer load, based on various performance metrics.

trans-unit.source: React to issues in real-time with monitoring and alerts to automatically notify you and your team.
trans-unit.target: React to issues in real-time with monitoring and alerts to automatically notify you and your team.

trans-unit.source: Integrate advanced app analytics and monitoring functionality from New Relic and AppInsights to get even richer insight into how your Mobile app is performing.
trans-unit.target: Integrate advanced app analytics and monitoring functionality from New Relic and AppInsights to get even richer insight into how your Mobile app is performing.

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service you can now programatically and via portal setup alerts based on variety of performance metrics
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service you can now programatically and via portal setup alerts based on variety of performance metrics

trans-unit.source: Automatically back up your backend and database.
trans-unit.target: Automatically back up your backend and database.

trans-unit.source: Your code and data is secure from disaster and easily restored, allowing you to run your business with confidence.
trans-unit.target: Your code and data is secure from disaster and easily restored, allowing you to run your business with confidence.

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service you can now create multiple private testing and staging environments for your mobile apps.
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service you can now create multiple private testing and staging environments for your mobile apps.

trans-unit.source: Use them to perform testing before you deploy.
trans-unit.target: Use them to perform testing before you deploy.

trans-unit.source: Swap to production with no downtime.
trans-unit.target: Swap to production with no downtime.

trans-unit.source: Web apps are pre-loaded, ensuring the best customer experience.
trans-unit.target: Web apps are pre-loaded, ensuring the best customer experience.

trans-unit.source: By the time Azure App Service Mobile App feature becomes Generally Available, we will provide seamless migration experience for your existing Mobile Services to App Service should you choose to migrate.
trans-unit.target: By the time Azure App Service Mobile App feature becomes Generally Available, we will provide seamless migration experience for your existing Mobile Services to App Service should you choose to migrate.

trans-unit.source: In the meantime, you can start exploring App Service and take advantage of App Service for your existing Mobile Service by following this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: In the meantime, you can start exploring App Service and take advantage of App Service for your existing Mobile Service by following this tutorial.
